mapper.insert: insert into mboard values(mboard_seq.nextval, 1, #{bmnum}, #{bunum}, #{bsubject}, #{bcon}, mboard_seq.currval, 0, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: select u.usid busid, u.uname buname, b.bnum bnum, b.bmnum bmnum, b.bunum bunum, b.bsubject bsubject, b.bcon bcon, b.bref bref, b.brestep brestep, b.brelevel brelevel, b.bdate bdate from mboard b, tuser u where b.bunum = u.unum and bmnum = #{mnum} and btype = 1 order by bref desc, brestep asc
mapper.update: update mboard set brestep = brestep + 1 where bref = #{bref} and brestep > 0
mapper.select: select * from mboard where btype =0 order by bnum desc
select bnum, bsubject,bcon, bdate, rank() over (order by bnum desc) rk from( select bnum, bsubject,bcon, bdate, rank() over (order by bnum desc) rk from mboard where btype=0) where rk between 1 and 3
